title_en: OpenAI and Microsoft Join UK-led AI Safety Initiative
title_zh: OpenAI 與微軟加入英國領導的 AI 安全倡議
summary_en: OpenAI and Microsoft have joined a UK-led international coalition to strengthen the evaluation and governance of advanced AI systems, supporting the AI Security Institute’s Alignment Project.
summary_zh: OpenAI 與微軟已加入由英國領導的國際聯盟，旨在加強對先進 AI 系統的評估與監管，並為人工智慧安全研究所的「對齊項目」提供資金與技術支持。

title_en: Taalas Raises $169M for AI Inference Chip Development
title_zh: 晶片新創 Taalas 融資 1.69 億美元加速 AI 推理晶片研發
summary_en: Toronto-based chip startup Taalas announced a massive $169 million funding round to accelerate the development of its specialized AI inference chips, targeting enterprise-scale applications.
summary_zh: 總部位於多倫多的晶片新創公司 Taalas 宣佈完成 1.69 億美元的巨額融資，用於加速其專用 AI 推理晶片的開發，以滿足企業級大規模應用需求。

title_en: Rezolve AI Acquires Reward to Enhance Customer Engagement
title_zh: Rezolve AI 以 2.3 億美元收購 Reward 以強化客戶互動
summary_en: Rezolve AI has completed the acquisition of customer engagement platform Reward for $230 million, aiming to integrate AI capabilities into personalized retail experiences.
summary_zh: Rezolve AI 以 2.3 億美元收購了客戶互動平台 Reward，旨在將人工智慧技術整合到個性化零售體驗中，提升品牌與客戶的連接。

title_en: Fintech Innovation in 2026: Bank Charters and Vertical Integration
title_zh: 2026 金融科技趨勢：銀行牌照與垂直整合
summary_en: Industry experts predict that 2026 will see more fintech companies seeking bank charters and pursuing vertical integration to control more of the financial value chain.
summary_zh: 業內專家預測，2026 年將有更多金融科技公司尋求獲得銀行牌照並進行垂直整合，以掌握更多金融價值鏈的主導權。

title_en: AI and ESG: Sustainable Finance to Integrate Precise Analytics
title_zh: AI 與 ESG 結合：可持續金融將整合精準分析技術
summary_en: By 2026, sustainable finance is expected to deeply integrate AI for precise impact analytics, helping scale green investments and mitigate climate risks through tokenized assets.
summary_zh: 預計到 2026 年，可持續金融將深度整合 AI 以進行精準的影響力分析，透過代幣化綠色資產推動綠色投資規模化並降低氣候風險。
